name: Epic Hunting
description:
THIS IS A TEST DEMO

Description

Epic hunting is a video game about hunting with machine guns by Redfive11, it is available for Windows.

Lore

The year is -32XX, and the government of Toastinia has repealed all animal cruelty laws associated with hunting. Now, Toastinians no longer hunt for sport, but for the sick power fantasy they get from decimating the wildlife with deadly weapons. But the animals wont let this happen, and have chosen to band together and fight back. Many company's offer services to the government to exterminate the rebelling animals. You work for Syrup Co., the best of the best in extreme extermination. Use ballistics, burns, or booms to take out the animals and to fulfill contracts so you can make those sweet, sweet profits.

Other

Please consider downloading this game and leaving some comments about it. You have no reason not too, its free! Also, if your feeling extra generous, you can leave a donation of any amount you like! Its more the thought of you donating that counts than the amount off cash you throw at me.
